response.overview: Self-made millionaire Thornton Melon decides to get a better education and enrolls at his son Jason's college. While Jason tries to fit in with his fellow students, Thornton struggles to gain his son's respect, giving way to hilarious antics.
response.tagline: He enrolled in college for the pursuit of finer things...like co-eds, shapely professors, fun and rock and roll.
response.title: Back to School

results.name: Back to School (1986) | Twist & Shout Scene | MGM Studios
